title: Woman Loses It On Amy’s Flight + Bobby Reveals How Much Was Raised For Veteran Scotty West’s Home
itunes:title: Woman Loses It On Amy’s Flight + Bobby Reveals How Much Was Raised For Veteran Scotty West’s Home
description:
Amy talks about the huge scene a woman caused on her flight. Bobby reveals how much listeners raised to build wounded veteran Scotty West a new home. Also, Producer Raymundo practices for his upcoming Bass Pro Shops appearance.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
